sentences.english: The sandy beach once invited me to move a net company, but carried out because of personal reason.
sentences.chinese: 沙灘曾邀請我去動網公司，但由於個人原因沒有實現。

sentences.english: It's enough if there are merely other people on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕沙灘上有其他人，那也就足夠了。

sentences.english: A sea of troubles, nothing moving part, the sand beach also is bad.
sentences.chinese: 遠望了一下海，沒有什麼動人之處，沙灘的沙也不好。

sentences.english: Janet and Maria were on a camping trip at the beach when it suddenly began to rain.
sentences.chinese: 珍娜和瑪麗亞在沙灘上露營時，卻突然下起雨來。

sentences.english: When the beach angle is small, the over-height caused by tides is very profound.
sentences.chinese: 當海岸沙灘傾角較小時，由潮汐產生的超高非常明顯。

sentences.english: Laze on the white-sand beach or golf on two world-ranked courses.
sentences.chinese: 在白沙灘或高爾夫球拉則在兩個世界排名課程。

sentences.english: Many boys are running about on the sand beach.
sentences.chinese: 很多男孩在沙灘上亂跑。

sentences.english: A group fighting broke out on the beach yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天沙灘上發生了一起羣毆事件。

sentences.english: Massive, granite rock formations overlook beautiful, white-sand beaches.
sentences.chinese: 龐大的花崗岩陣列俯瞰美麗的白色沙灘。

sentences.english: Excuse me, sir. Can you tell me where the bus stop for Shatan Street is?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，先生。請問去沙灘大街的公共汽車站在哪裏？

sentences.english: Hawaii's famed white sandy beaches are shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷著名白沙灘正在萎縮。

sentences.english: Serious surfers are much stronger and thinner than beach boys.
sentences.chinese: 衝浪運動員要比沙灘小夥兒強壯得多，瘦得多。

sentences.english: While (he was)walking along the sands . Crusoe saw some footprints in the sand.
sentences.chinese: 克魯索沿沙灘走着的時候，看到沙子上有些腳印。

sentences.english: It was not crowded and we had plenty of space.
sentences.chinese: 沙灘上人不擁擠，所以我們有很大的空間。

sentences.english: There I can play on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 在那兒我可以在沙灘上玩耍。

sentences.english: He trotted through the sand, enduring the sun's enmity .
sentences.chinese: 他忍着驕陽的炙烤，小步跑過沙灘。

definition: Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
